Configuration.Data_Provider:
TitleNameInstitute
Principal InvestigatorStephen ChanockNational Cancer Institute, National Health Institute, Bethesda, MD, USA
Configuration.Description: This study investigates methylation patterns in promoter regions on the X chromosomes of females with X chromosome mosaicism in an effort to phase mosaic events to either the active or inactive X chromosome.
Configuration.StudyInEx: Females with genotyping array detected X mosaic events greater than 2 Mb in size and with available DNA
